title: I just don't get it.
body:
Guy calls me a troll repeatedly before the game just because of what champ I picked.  I support(in a normal), and go 4/1/12, while my adc goes 11/1/8.  After the game the guy vehemently defends what he said and continues to call me a troll repeatedly.  What gives?  You can't just treat someone like shit because they broke meta.  In addition, once champ select is over, you're locked in with this person.  Why exaggerate the problem and try and cause arguments when you are guaranteed to have to deal with this person for at least 20 minutes?

In general, you guys really need to chill out a bit.  Especially in regards to normals.

Edit: aaaaand I get downvoted.  There's your community.   Wonder why it's such an issue?  :P

replies.body:
Got nothing against a Jinx support, but I have issue with Jinx support that has 83 CS in a 26 minute game lmao 

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=insanesamurai
Doesn't sound unreasonable especially if every lane was pushed in, and people were busy elsewhere. Or your adc had to back.

I would rather have my support freeze the lane. 

83 CS. That is at least 11 waves of full waves, and no offense to any lower elo players, but I don't anyone below gold can actually not miss a single CS in 11 waves, so assuming he misses only one per wave, that is a total of 15 waves we are looking at. it takes about 9-10 minutes just for 15 waves to spawn and reach lane. 

It isn't hard to conclude that either he was fighting his ADC for CS, he never grouped to fight but push wave all game long after lane phase, or he went into the jungle to take jungle creeps. All of which is not what a support should be doing.
You're getting downvoted because you allowed the extremely obvious troll get the better of you and it's pathetic.

> [{quoted}](name=Izbiz,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=GqJiE7Hb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-26T14:37:53.403+0000)
>
> You're getting downvoted because you allowed the extremely obvious troll get the better of you and it's pathetic.

This is also to FHMarshey.  They kept leaving me alone bot.  What am I supposed to not defend the turret?  Is this guy(theres one of these guys in like every other game) supposed to be allowed to treat me like trash?  You people are amazing.  Just go ahead and make bizarre assumptions, so long as they make me at fault, right?  There's the community.

Edit: Hah, you made a wrong assumption, I told you what the game was really like, and you downvote me.  Nice.  You fit right in here.
